reviewText: It's kind of a tease. I have the first three seasons and love, love, love them. But now I'm ready to continue to see what happens to Tanya & the wives, and they do not make the DVDs for my region. That's so not fair. I fell in love with this series when it was on BBC America. All five seasons+ Footballers Wive$ Overtime, with Tanya's sister continuing the drama you can't turn away. Now I want to finish my collection, and I can't. This is an unhappy ending to a fabulous show. So sad!!!
Why is this DVD STILL not available in a USA useable format..ie no season 4 nor season 5 in the USA.
